title: 3 Graded Outstanding S74 silks for sale
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 3 Graded Outstanding S74 silks for sale
posts.post_content:
Offered for sale here are three top looking s74 silks. The Raymond is a tough bronze color and for whatever reason (possibly the fraying on top) got a 4.5 . Shean and Devlin are in fabulous near mint condition. I will also consider trades for white S-74 silks with paper ad backs that I need for my set
Raymond 150.00
Devlin 175.00
Shean 200.00
